title: A Sense of movement
creator_credit: Sue Jerrard, Veronica Sherborne and University of Bristol
brief_description: Made at New Fosseway School for severely subnormal children in Bristol, England, the film shows 15 year olds and 6 year olds taking movement classes with Veronica Sherborne.
